name: Rocks and Rockets
description:
Rocks and Rockets - a terrific action game where you have to control the rocket and to cope with a very hostile environment. You can destroy the enemies plasma balls, but the enemies will not slumber and will pit you against your entire arsenal: from dangerous to deadly spikes, hot lava drops!

★Original soundtrack
★An atmosphere in which you want to plunge
★Bosses!
★A variety of opponents
★Hardcore

Will you be able to overcome all obstacles and to survive in such a dangerous environment?
